name: minigun-profiler
description: minigun-profiler - cpu and memory tracker for node.js apps used by `minigun-core`

scripts.format: find . -name '*.js' | grep -v node_modules | grep -v coverage | xargs jscs --preset=google
scripts.lint: find . -name '*.js' | grep -v node_modules | grep -v coverage | xargs eslint

author: Mi Ji Kim <miji.kim926@gmail.com>
